details.summary: We develop political, cultural, economic and commercial ties to improve Britain and Argentina's relationship.
details.description:
We contribute towards increasing bilateral trade and investment and by promoting sustainable, low carbon economic growth . We champion UK values and work with a wide range of Argentine organisations and institutions who share similar values in areas such as human rights, climate change and science and innovation.

We provide consular assistance for British nationals, offering help appropriate to each individual circumstance, and coordinating with the honorary consuls’ network in Mendoza, Santa Fe and Córdoba. We also cover Paraguay remotely.
details.services:
Visas

For information on whether you require a visa for the United Kingdom and how to apply go to the UK Border Agency website

Births, deaths and marriages

Information on how you can register a birth or death which occurred overseas, and legal documents for couples marrying or entering into civil partnerships abroad.

Passports and emergency travel documents

How to renew or replace your British passport when outside of the UK and information on getting replacement travel documents if your passport is lost or stolen.

Travel Advice

Information on staying safe and avoiding problems when living or travelling abroad, with links to our embassies, high commissions and other diplomatic posts across the world.

Legalisation Service

How to get official confirmation that your UK public documentation is genuine so it can be accepted by foreign authorities. The UK does not require any documents to be legalised for use within the UK.

Consular fees

Information on the current cost of fee-bearing services.

Notarial and documentary services

Information about official documents, certificates, letters, and notes available, including whether or not you need to book an appointment with us.

details.description: Monday to Thursday: 8:45am to 5:30pm; Friday: 8:45am to 2:00pm. See Access and opening times to make an appointment for notarial services.
details.access_and_opening_times:
Notarial services

We provide limited notarial services by appointment.

Access for the disabled

Wherever possible, we have made our buildings and services accessible. Sometimes however, this is not possible due to security or other restrictions. In these situations we will endeavour to provide a service or access to a building in an alternative way to ensure equality of access for disabled people. To assist disabled visitors, we have set out below details of disabled access at this Embassy. We hope this information is helpful.

General physical access: Embassy

  • The main entrance to the Embassy is accessible to wheelchair-users from the side of the road.
  • There are no steps or staircases to gain access to the Main Reception or Consular/Visa Section
  • Lifts are available to all floors and are accessible for wheelchair-users;
  • There are no disabled toilets available in the Embassy;
  • There is no public parking around the Embassy;
  • Floor coverings: The floors of the Embassy are even and flat. The surrounding areas are the province of the local council, but are generally flat and accessible to disabled people;
  • Handrails are provided on the stairs between floors and are easy to grip;
  • Doors are easily accessible to all users;
  • Emergency/evacuation: staff are available to assist disabled visitors in case of emergency/evacuation. Emergency alarm points are accessible to wheel-chair users;
  • Phones are set at desk height and are accessibly to wheelchair-users.

General physical access: Residence

  • The main entrance to the Residence is accessible to wheelchair-users from the side of the road.
  • There is a step before you can gain access to the Reception area – a portable ramp is available.
  • Lifts are available to all floors and are accessible for wheelchair-users;
  • There are disabled toilets available in the Residence;
  • There is no public parking around the Residence;
  • Floor coverings: The floors of the Residence are even and flat. The surrounding areas are the province of the local council, but are generally flat and accessible to disabled people;
  • Handrails are provided on the stairs between floors and are easy to grip;
  • Doors are easily accessible to all users;
  • Emergency/evacuation: staff are available to assist disabled visitors in case of emergency/evacuation. Emergency alarm points are accessible to wheel-chair users.

Access for visually-impaired visitors

  • Signs are clear and recognisable and use Internationally recognised signs where appropriate;
  • Guide dogs are welcome.

Access for Deaf/hard of hearing visitors

  • Hearing loops are not installed;
  • Minicom and textphones are not installed;
  • Sign language is not available at this time;
  • Hearing dogs are welcome.

Contact us

If you need to visit us or use our services and feel that they may be inaccessible to you, please contact Diego Balboa, Estate Management Section by email or by telephone on 4808 2200 who will try to find an alternative way of providing access for you.

Public holidays

The British Embassy in Buenos Aires will remain closed during the following public holidays in 2013

  • 1 January,
  • 11 February,
  • 12 February,
  • 29 March,
  • 1 April,
  • 1 May,
  • 20 June,
  • 21 June,
  • 9 July,
  • 19 August,
  • 14 October,
  • 25 November,
  • 24 December,
  • 25 December

details.summary: UK Trade & Investment (UKTI) helps UK-based companies succeed in the global economy. We also help overseas companies bring their high-quality investment to the UK’s dynamic economy.
details.description:
UKTI offers expertise and contacts through its extensive network of specialists in the UK, and in British embassies and other diplomatic offices around the world. We provide companies with the tools they require to be competitive on the world stage.

Responsibilities

UKTI in Argentina helps companies in Britain increase their competitiveness through overseas trade in Argentina. We also offer professional, authoritative and personalised assistance to help companies in Argentina locate and expand in the UK.

You can find out more about how we are Increasing business with Argentina.
details.services:
Start a business in the UK

UKTI offers dedicated, professional, personalised assistance to help you locate and expand your business in the UK, read about our investment services or contact us to find out more.

Export from the UK

UKTI can assist you on every step of the exporting journey in both the UK and overseas, read about our exporting services or contact us to find out more.

Events

UKTI and its partners stage events in the UK and abroad to help companies looking to export. You can browse scheduled events and register for alerts.

Business opportunities

UKTI is always looking to provide an international network of opportunities for UK Companies looking to export. You can search these opportunities and register for alerts.

details.description:
Opening hours:
Monday to Thursday: 9:00am to 1:00pm and 2:00pm to 5:30pm
Friday: 9:00am to 1:00pm
